content:
Here's my response as the user:

"Yeah, textiles are a great idea! Throw blankets and pillows can really add a lot of warmth and coziness to the room. I think earthy tones like oatmeal, sage, or moss would work really well with the beige walls and gray rug. They'll bring in a natural, calming feel and tie in nicely with the plants I'm planning to add. What do you think about adding a statement piece, like a colorful piece of artwork or a bold-patterned rug, to really make the room pop?"
